toasts.orgRegisterSuccess: Your organization has been successfully registered.

intro.whyWhatIsAster: Aster is a management app for animal welfare organizations.
intro.whyHowHelps: By bringing together your schedule, your foster families map and your to-do list, Aster is here to make your work easier.
intro.howFirstParagraph: Create an account, register your organization, invite your members, and add your foster families and animals.
intro.howSecondParagraph: 100% free and ad-free, Aster has only one goal: helping the people who do everything to help animals.
intro.whatsNextParagraph1: From your dashboard, you can see your foster families on a map and instantly spot which ones are available.
intro.whatsNextParagraph2: You can also see animals waiting for placement, those ready for adoption, and access your schedule to manage your tasks and share them with the rest of the team.

register.alreadyExists: An account already exists with this email address.
register.phoneDisclaimer: Your phone number is only used to help communication within your organization. Aster will never use it for anything else.

resetPassword.sent: If an account exists with this email, a message has just been sent.
resetPassword.error: An error occurred while sending the email.
resetPassword.disclaimer: Enter the email address of your account to reset your password.

changePassword.invalidOrExpired: The reset request is invalid or has expired.

firstName.minLength: First name must be at least 2 characters long.

lastName.minLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters long.

email.invalid: The e-mail address is not valid.

phone.minLength: The phone number must be at least 6 characters long.
phone.maxLength: The phone number is too long.
phone.invalid: The phone number doesn’t seem valid.

password.minLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

contact.notice: A bug, a question, an idea, an issue with using the app... Don’t hesitate: I read everything!
contact.accept: By sending this message, I consent to sharing my email address with the developer so they can contact me. *
